aboutPage.title: About Lyana Travel Agency
aboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted partner for specialized visa services to Dubai and Greece.
aboutPage.whoWeAreDesc1: Lyana is a specialized visa service company focused exclusively on facilitating travel to Dubai and Greece. We combine in-depth knowledge of visa regulations with a commitment to exceptional customer service to provide a seamless experience for our clients.
aboutPage.whoWeAreDesc2: Our team consists of experienced visa consultants with extensive expertise in navigating the specific requirements and procedures for UAE and Schengen visas. We understand the complexities involved and have developed streamlined processes to ensure high approval rates.
aboutPage.whoWeAreDesc3: What distinguishes Lyana is our specialized approach. Rather than offering general visa services for numerous destinations, we focus exclusively on Dubai and Greece, allowing us to provide unmatched expertise and insider knowledge for these specific locations.
aboutPage.ourMissionDesc: To simplify the visa application process for Dubai and Greece, making international travel more accessible and stress-free for our clients through expert guidance, efficient service, and a commitment to integrity.
aboutPage.reliabilityDesc: We deliver consistent, dependable service that our clients can count on throughout the visa application process.
aboutPage.expertiseDesc: Our specialized knowledge in Dubai and Greece visa requirements ensures informed guidance and high success rates.
aboutPage.clientFocusDesc: We prioritize our clients' needs, providing personalized solutions and attentive service from start to finish.
aboutPage.integrityDesc: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical practices in all our visa facilitation services.

contactPage.heroSubtitle: Have questions about our visa services? Our team is ready to assist you. Reach out through any of the contact methods below or fill out our form for a prompt response.

contactInfo.addressDetails1: Dubai Office: 123 Business Avenue, Suite 500, Dubai, UAE
contactInfo.addressDetails2: Athens Office: 45 Visa Street, Suite 200, Athens, Greece

faq.question: How long does the visa application process take?
faq.answer: Processing times vary depending on the type of visa and destination. Dubai visas typically take 3-5 business days, while Greece (Schengen) visas may take 10-15 business days. We recommend applying at least 3-4 weeks before your planned travel date.

faq.question: What if my visa application is rejected?
faq.answer: In case of rejection, we'll analyze the reasons provided by the embassy/consulate and advise on the best course of action. This may include addressing the specific concerns and reapplying, or exploring alternative visa options. Our services include one reapplication free of charge if needed.

faq.question: Do I need to visit your office in person?
faq.answer: No, our services are designed to be fully remote. We can handle the entire process via email, phone, and video consultations. We'll guide you on providing necessary documents electronically, and physical documents can be sent via secure courier if required.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept major credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal. All payments are secured with industry-standard encryption. Payment is typically required in two phases: an initial consultation fee and the remaining balance when your application is ready for submission.

contactPage.locationsDesc: With offices in Dubai and Athens, we're strategically positioned to provide specialized visa services for our focus destinations.

dubaiPage.heroSubtitle: Seamless visa processing for your journey to the dazzling city of Dubai. Our expertise ensures a smooth application experience with high approval rates.
dubaiPage.introDesc1: Dubai, with its stunning architecture, luxurious shopping, and vibrant culture, awaits your exploration. Our specialized visa services remove the complexities of the application process, allowing you to focus on planning your perfect Dubai adventure.
dubaiPage.introDesc2: Whether you're visiting for tourism, business, or transit purposes, our team of experienced visa consultants provides personalized guidance to ensure your application meets all UAE requirements for a successful outcome.
dubaiPage.introDesc3: With Lyana's Dubai visa services, you gain access to expertise that significantly streamlines the process, saving you time and reducing the risk of application rejection.
dubaiPage.servicesSubtitle: Select the visa option that best suits your travel needs. Each service includes comprehensive support throughout the application process.
dubaiPage.touristVisaDesc: Perfect for leisure travel to experience Dubai's attractions
dubaiPage.businessVisaDesc: Ideal for corporate meetings and business opportunities
dubaiPage.transitVisaDesc: Short stay option for travelers passing through Dubai
dubaiPage.processSubtitle: Our streamlined approach makes obtaining your Dubai visa quick and hassle-free
dubaiPage.step1Desc: Speak with our visa experts to determine the right visa type for your travel needs.
dubaiPage.step2Desc: Submit required documents which our team will carefully review for accuracy and completeness.
dubaiPage.step3Desc: We handle the submission process, ensuring all requirements are properly addressed.
dubaiPage.step4Desc: Receive your visa approval and prepare for your journey to Dubai.
dubaiPage.reqSubtitle: Essential documents and information needed for your Dubai visa application
dubaiPage.req1Content: Your passport must be valid for at least six months beyond your planned stay in Dubai. It should have at least two blank visa pages for entry stamps.
dubaiPage.req2Content: Recent color photographs (taken within the last 3 months) with white background, sized according to UAE visa photo specifications.
dubaiPage.req3Content: Confirmed round-trip flight reservation showing entry to and exit from Dubai, with dates that match your intended stay period.
dubaiPage.req4Content: Proof of accommodation for the duration of your stay, either hotel bookings or a letter of invitation if staying with residents.
dubaiPage.req5Content: Bank statements from the last 3-6 months showing sufficient funds to cover your stay in Dubai. A minimum balance may be required depending on the visa type.
dubaiPage.req6Content: Comprehensive travel insurance that covers medical emergencies, hospitalization, and repatriation for the entire duration of your stay in Dubai.
dubaiPage.contactTitle: Ready to Apply for Your Dubai Visa?
dubaiPage.contactSubtitle: Contact our Dubai visa specialists today to begin your application process. We're here to answer your questions and guide you every step of the way.
dubaiPage.choose1: • Specialized expertise in UAE visa regulations
dubaiPage.choose4: • Time-saving service with minimal effort required from you
dubaiPage.choose5: • Dedicated support from application to approval
dubaiPage.startApplicationSubtitle: Fill out the form below to connect with our Dubai visa specialists.

greecePage.heroSubtitle: Expert guidance through the Greece visa application process. We simplify Schengen visa requirements to make your journey to Greece smooth and stress-free.
greecePage.introDesc1: From the historic Acropolis in Athens to the stunning beaches of Crete and Santorini, Greece offers a captivating blend of ancient history and modern allure. Our specialized Schengen visa services simplify the application process, allowing you to focus on planning your unforgettable Greek getaway.
greecePage.introDesc2: We assist with tourist visas, business travel, and long-stay applications, ensuring your documentation is perfectly prepared according to consulate requirements. Our expertise navigates the complexities of Schengen regulations.
greecePage.introDesc3: Trust Lyana to guide you through the Greece visa application process efficiently and reliably. Let us handle the paperwork while you anticipate exploring the birthplace of democracy and the beauty of the Aegean Sea.
greecePage.santoriniCaption: Santorini - One of Greece's most iconic destinations
greecePage.servicesSubtitle: Choose the visa option that fits your travel plans to Greece or other Schengen countries. All services include expert support.
greecePage.touristVisaDesc: For leisure travelers visiting Greece's beautiful destinations
greecePage.businessVisaDesc: Designed for professionals attending meetings or conferences
greecePage.longStayVisaDesc: For those planning extended stays or special purposes
greecePage.processSubtitle: We've simplified the Schengen visa application to ensure a smooth experience.
greecePage.step1Desc: Consultation to determine your eligibility and the appropriate visa category for your travel needs.
greecePage.step2Desc: Guidance on collecting and preparing all required documentation according to Greek consulate standards.
greecePage.step3Desc: Professional submission of your application, including assistance with appointments and forms.
greecePage.step4Desc: Collection of your approved visa and final preparation for your journey to Greece.
greecePage.reqSubtitle: Key documents needed for your Greece and Schengen area visa application.
greecePage.req1Content: Your passport must be valid for at least three months beyond your planned departure date from the Schengen Area. It should have at least two blank pages and be issued within the last 10 years.
greecePage.req2Content: A completed and signed Schengen visa application form. Our team will assist you in filling this out correctly to avoid common mistakes.
greecePage.req3Content: Two recent color photographs meeting the specific Schengen visa photo requirements (35mm x 45mm, light background).
greecePage.req4Content: Proof of travel medical insurance covering at least €30,000 for medical emergencies and repatriation, valid throughout the Schengen area for your entire stay.
greecePage.req5Content: Hotel reservations or proof of accommodation for your entire stay in Greece and any other Schengen countries you plan to visit.
greecePage.req6Content: Round-trip flight reservation showing dates of entry and exit from the Schengen Area.
greecePage.req7Content: Bank statements from the last 3-6 months showing sufficient funds to support yourself during your stay (approximately €50-100 per day of your visit).
greecePage.req8Content: A detailed day-by-day itinerary of your planned activities and places to visit in Greece and any other Schengen countries.
greecePage.contactTitle: Apply for Your Greece Visa Today
greecePage.contactSubtitle: Connect with our Schengen visa experts to start your application. We're ready to assist with all your travel documentation needs.
greecePage.whyChooseUs: Benefits of Our Greece Visa Service
